name: WP Full Screen Search
author: Mayank Majeji, ThemeMantis

sections.description:
Easily Enable Full Screen Search On Your WordPress Website

This plugin allows you to add full screen search form to your WordPress website.

A full screen search form reduces distractions for your website visitors and ensures 100% of your customer’s focus on the site’s search and product results.

There are simple settings for this plugin which allows you to change background colors and text colors for full screen, search form, and close button.

Basically this plugin converts default WordPress search forms into full screen search overlay.

Credits

This plugin is created by Mayank Majeji and the ThemeMantis team.

What’s Next

If you find this plugin useful to optimize and speed up your WordPress website, then please leave a good rating. Your feedback will motivate us for good work.

To learn more about WordPress, SEO and Blogging, you can also visit UnmaskWP for tutorials and guides on topics like:

  • WordPress Code Snippets Library
  • [2024] How to Start an Online Store? (Step by Step)
  • How to Connect Domain Name with Web Hosting Service? (Step-by-step)

…and many more WordPress tutorials.

Notes

WP Full Screen Search is the easiest way to add full screen search overlay to your WordPress website by simply activating the plugin.

We’ve done these simple tricks in all of our websites and wanted to share it with everyone, specially bloggers, beginners, and non-technical users.

I hope you will find WP Full Screen Search Plugin useful to add full screen search form to your WordPress website.

Thank you
Mayank Majeji
sections.installation:
1. Install WP Full Screen Search plugin by uploading the wp-full-screen-search directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate WP Full Screen Search through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Change Colors from Settings > WP Full Screen Search menu (Optional Step).
  4. Navigate to your WordPress website and click on the WordPress search form to see the magic.
sections.faq:
How to use WP Full Screen Search on my WordPress website?

All you need to do is to activate WP Full Screen Search plugin and sit back. It will automatically convert your website’s default WordPress search form to full screen search overlay forms.

Can I change background and text colors of full screen overlay form?

Yes. You can easily change background and text colors from plugin’s settings page.

Can I change placeholder text of full screen search overlay?

Yes. You can change placeholder text from the settings page.
